body.name: 2K Front and 1080P Rear Dash Cam, Dual Dashboard Camera for Cars, 3" Display, 170° Wide Angle Video Recorder, Night Vision, WDR, Parking Mode, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 21 mins
features: 2K + 1080p Dual Dash Cam - Using the 2K front dash cam can keep recording the views from your car across an epic road trip, dual dash cam helps you settle disputes following crashes, traffic stops, break-ins by capturing a clear picture. You can choose to install the rear dash cam inside your car to prevent it from being stolen and damaged, ensuring the following crashes are fully recorded.

Evidence Protection Parking Mode - A reliable recorder with Parking Mode, G-sensor, Loop Recording, emergency video lock monitors the surrounding environment continuously, works great for cars, SUVs, jeeps, and truck while parked in parking lots or along city streets.

Easy Installation - Easily and safely mount and removed the front camera with a windshield suction cup in seconds. And then, plug the type-c power cable into the type-c port on the device and reroute the power cable to your vehicle power outlet.

Remarkable WDR & Night Vision - Adopt f/2.0 aperture and WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) to achieve super night vision by increasing exposure in extremely dark situations automatically, ensures more flexibility and better viewing even in bad weather.

Large LCD & Wide Angle Lens - 3in IPS LCD display offers you a clear view whether you are viewing a video or reversing. 170° front camera and 140° rear camera, which can monitor ultra wide angles simultaneously to protect you from potential unnecessary accidents and liability issues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Installing the front dash cam Attach the Suction Cup Mount with the front camera by sliding the buckle.Clean your car's window to avoid any obstruction, window tint, moisture, or any other objects from where the device will be installed.Attach the device to the windshield glass using the suction mount included.To lock the suction mount: Press & hold it tight to remove any air between suction mount and the windshield, and then turn the LOCKING Knob towards CLOCKWISE to LOCK in place.Plug the type-c power cable into the type-c port on the device and reroute the power cable to your vehicle power outlet. Specification of C306FR Display: 3” IPS ScreenVideo Resolution: Front Lens 2K (1440P) QHD + Rear Lens 1080PVideo Playback: PC/TV/Dash CamDimension: 87*53*33mmWeight: 71.4g * Application files of the gpsplayer will be stored automatically in the SD Card which used in the dash cam C306FR. Double click the files of gpsplayer to start downloading.Video Playback: PC/TV/Dash Cam Q & A If the emergency videos won’t be saved when the locked file room is full? Or it will work in loop recording automatically? You can choose it. If you want the locked video works in loop recording, click the “Emergency File Loop” and choose “Delete old”.Can I record out my windshield while and the inside of my cars interior at the same time? Yes. Equipped with dual cameras, you can install the rear camera inside your car to record where you want.Does it capture audio? Yes, this dash cam front and rear are built-in microphone to record audio with video.*More question about operation, please check the User Manual PDF or leave a question on Q&A page, our service team will send you a detailed instruction.

Night Vision Record license plates and signs clearly even in the dark, greatly reduce the interference of the video image caused by the strong light of the vehicle ahead. User Friendly The rear-facing camera making for a surprisingly elegant solution for capturing, even in -4°F to 158°F (-20°C to 70°C) areas, making it ideal for extreme hot-weather or cold-weather areas. Gravity Sensor Dash cam with the G-sensor can detect shakes and collisions around your vehicle, record the emergency situation and save the videos automatically.

Parking Monitor Captures vandalism when parked. (* Does not work without ACC hardwire kit. ACC HARDWIRE KIT NOT INCLUDED.) Loop Recording Drivers are putting dash cams into cars is to limit liability in accidents and capture vandalism when parked. Remember to transfer it to your computer regularly if you want to keep it. Wide Dynamic Range By turning the WDR feature, you will get one true-to-life clearer image even in strong sunlight.
